#summary The col align attribute specifies the horizontal alignment of the element within its bounding box.
#labels about-html,about-tables,is-html-attribute,from-w3c

You are here: [Welcome Home] > [HTMLReference HTML Reference] > [HTMLElements Elements] > [ColElement <col> element] > *align attribute*

== Usage ==

The `align` attribute is deprecated in favor of the [TextAlignCSSProperty text-align CSS property], but browsers still support it.

== Values ==

  * `left` (default)
  * `center`
  * `right`

== Elements ==

You can use the `align` attribute on the following elements:

  * [AddressElement <address>]
  * [AppletElement <applet>]
  * [BlockquoteElement <blockquote>]
  * [BodyElement <body>]
  * [CaptionElement <caption>]
  * [CenterElement <center>]
  * [ColElement <col>]
  * [ColgroupElement <colgroup>]
  * [DdElement <dd>]
  * [DirElement <dir>]
  * [DivElement <div>]
  * [DlElement <dl>]
  * [DtElement <dt>]
  * [EmbedElement <embed>]
  * [FieldsetElement <fieldset>]
  * [FormElement <form>]
  * [HrElement <hr>]
  * [IframeElement <iframe>]
  * [ImgElement <img>]
  * [InputElement <input>]
  * [IsindexElement <isindex>]
  * [LegendElement <legend>]
  * [LiElement <li>]
  * [ListingElement <listing>]
  * [MenuElement <menu>]
  * [ObjectElement <object>]
  * [OlElement <ol>]
  * [PElement <p>]
  * [PlaintextElement <plaintext>]
  * [SelectElement <select>]
  * [SpacerElement <spacer>]
  * [TableElement <table>]
  * [TbodyElement <tbody>]
  * [TdElement <td>]
  * [ThElement <th>]
  * [TfootElement <tfoot>]
  * [TheadElement <thead>]
  * [TrElement <tr>]
  * [UlElement <ul>]
  * [XmpElement <xmp>]
